title: The Book of God - How We Got the Bible (Kingstone)
description:
OK everyone, we here at the LTS Comic Book Emporium hopes that all of us are enlightened enough to allow for the facts that everyone should be able to enjoy comic books, and that the same topic and/or subject matter can be discussed from many different points of view. Basically, please keep it civil.

All of the Kingstone comics are faith based in the Christian religion, usually dealing directly with a person or story from the Bible. 

-----------------------------------------------------

The Book of God - How We Got the Bible

Kingstone Comics, 2013, 130 pages

Written by Ben Avery

Illustrated by Javier Saltares

Colored by Ben Prenevost
